Test.TestName: ACCESSCONTROL-5-1-2 ACCESS CONTROL – ACCESS POINT ENABLED EVENT STATE CHANGE
Test.Name: Correct response with one token

ExpectedResult.TestSummary:
ACCESSCONTROL-5-1-2 ACCESS CONTROL – ACCESS POINT ENABLED EVENT STATE CHANGE
STEP 1 - Get Access Control service address Transmit done Receive done http://localhost:17934/ServicePACS12/PACSService.asmx STEP PASSED
STEP 2 - Check that the DUT returned Access Control service address STEP PASSED

STEP 14 - Disable AccessPoint [token='tokenAccessPoint1'] Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 15 - Send PullMessages request Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 16 - Validate CurrentTime and TerminationTime STEP PASSED
STEP 17 - Check that a maximum number of 1 Notification Messages is included in PullMessagesResponse STEP PASSED
STEP 18 - Response is not empty STEP PASSED
STEP 19 - Check if the message should be considered Message filtered out STEP PASSED
STEP 20 - Send PullMessages request Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 21 - Validate CurrentTime and TerminationTime STEP PASSED
STEP 22 - Check that a maximum number of 1 Notification Messages is included in PullMessagesResponse STEP PASSED
STEP 23 - Response is not empty STEP PASSED
STEP 24 - Check if the message should be considered STEP PASSED
STEP 25 - Send Unsubscribe request Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 26 - Verify that the DUT sends a PullMessagesResponse that contains one notification message. STEP PASSED
STEP 27 - Validate messages STEP PASSED
STEP 28 - Check that state is the same in Notification and in GetAccessPointStateResponse STEP PASSED
TEST PASSED
